name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BugHerd: Visual Feedback Tool for Websites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BugHerd is a visual feedback tool for websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BugHerd is the most popular visual feedback tool and bug reporting tool for websites, designs, and documents. Loved by thousands of teams worldwide, BugHerd allows you to collect and manage feedback directly on all digital assets. Imagine pinning sticky notes directly onto your webpage, design mockups, or documents to capture client feedback, track bugs, and manage tasks‚Äîall without leaving your browser. 

BugHerd makes it easy for anyone, even non-technical users, to provide clear and actionable feedback. It automatically sends feedback and bug reports (including screenshots, browser, OS, CSS selector data, and more) to a project and task management Kanban board so that all feedback can be easily managed and actioned.

BugHerd dramatically reduces the usual back and forth with your clients, and can help you deliver your projects up to 30% faster.  

üåüWhy Install BugHerd?üåü

‚Ä¢ Providing Feedback is Simple: Designed for both technical and non-technical users, BugHerd‚Äôs simple point-and-click interface makes it easy for anyone to give feedback.
‚Ä¢ Collect Feedback Easily:  Feedback and bug reports are pinned directly onto websites, PDFs, images, Figma files and more.
‚Ä¢ Tech Info is Automatically Captured: Automatically included with every piece of feedback and bug report are screenshots, browser details, operating system info, screen resolution, etc
‚Ä¢ Manage Feedback Easily: All tasks flow straight into BugHerd‚Äôs Kanban task board where they are centralized, and can be easily organized and actioned.
‚Ä¢ Seamless Collaboration: Share tasks and feedback with your team and clients, whether you‚Äôre working on websites, designs, or documents; making remote collaboration a breeze.
